trans-unit.source: Specifies the drawing mode for a background image.
trans-unit.target: 指定背景图像的绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration represents the drawing mode for a background image, as set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>枚举表示背景图像的绘图模式设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件。

trans-unit.source: To set a background image for a chart element, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置图表元素的背景图像，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the Unscaled value, the location where the image is drawn will depend on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的不成比例的值，其中绘制图像的位置将依赖于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Background image is scaled to fit the entire chart element.
trans-unit.target: 背景图像将进行缩放以适合整个图表元素的大小。

trans-unit.source: Background image is tiled to fit the entire chart element.
trans-unit.target: 背景图像进行平铺以适应整个图表元素。

trans-unit.source: Every other tiled image is reversed around the X-axis.
trans-unit.target: 围绕 X 轴反转其他每个平铺图像。

trans-unit.source: Every other tiled image is reversed around the X-axis and Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 围绕 X 轴和 Y 轴反转其他每个平铺图像。

trans-unit.source: Every other tiled image is reversed around the Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 每个其他平铺图像围绕 Y 轴进行反转。
